mapper.select: select if(seller_id=#{memberId}, customer_id, seller_id) target_id, message_room_id, board_id from tbl_message_room where (seller_id=#{memberId} or customer_id=#{memberId})
select count(message_room_id) from tbl_message_room where customer_id = #{memberId} or seller_id = #{memberId}
select count(message_id) from tbl_message where message_room_id =#{messageRoomId}
select date_format(max(message_register_date), '%y-%m-%d %h:%i') as latest_register_date from tbl_message where message_room_id = #{messageRoomId}
select message_room_id from tbl_message_room where board_id = #{boardId} and customer_id = #{customerId}
select member_id, member_nickname, member_profile_uuid, member_profile_path, member_profile_original_name from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_message (message_content, board_id, message_room_id, message_sender_id, message_getter_id) values(#{messageContent}, #{boardId}, #{messageRoomId}, #{messageSenderId}, #{messageGetterId})
insert into tbl_message_room (board_id, seller_id, customer_id) values(#{boardId}, #{sellerId}, #{customerId})
